maya/beastmayaplugin/src/renderjob.cpp

#include "beastutils.h"
#include "mayautils.h"
#include "plugincontext.h"
#include "renderjob.h"
#include "scenemanager.h"

#include <sstream>
#include <maya/MGlobal.h>

namespace beastmaya {

static bool runBeastAPIJob(BeastJob& job, ILBShowResults sr, ILBDistributionType dt) {
        job.start(sr, dt);

        std::unique_ptr<ScopedProgressBar> progressBar;

        while(job.isRunning()) {
                bool newActivity, newProgress;
                if (job.hasProgress(newActivity, newProgress)) {
                        std::wstring jobName;
                        int progress;
                        job.getProgress(jobName, progress);

                        if (newActivity) {
                                if (jobName.find(L"Post filtering Textures")!=std::string::npos) {
                                        // Initialize progress bar for filtering
                                        progressBar.reset(new ScopedProgressBar(true, L"Post Filtering Results"));
                                        progressBar->setProgressMax(100);
                                } else {
                                        // Don't show a progress bar for this activity
                                        progressBar.reset();
                                }
                        }

                        if (newProgress && progressBar) {
                                progressBar->setProgress(progress);
                        }
                }

                job.waitDone(-1);
        }
        return checkJobStatus(job.getResult());
}

RenderJob::RenderJob(JobContext& context) {
        BeastManager& manager = context.getPluginContext().getManager();
        std::wstring root = context.getPluginContext().getBeastRoot();
        BeastScene& scene = context.getSceneManager().getScene();

        // Use this if user has not selected any other file
        std::wstring config = root + L"/examples/data/simpleFG.xml";

        MObject settingsNode = findMayaNode(L"beastSettings");
        MString settingXML; 
        getPlugValue(settingsNode, L"configXml", settingXML);

        if (settingXML != "") {
                if (isFile(settingXML.asWChar())) {
                        config = settingXML.asWChar();
                } else {
                        std::wstringstream message;
                        message << L"Beast couldn't find the specified config XML file \"" << settingXML.asWChar() << L"\", using the default config instead.";
                        MGlobal::displayWarning(message.str().c_str());
                }
        }

        m_beastJob = manager.createJob(getGuid().c_str(), scene, config.c_str());

        float quality;
        getPlugValue(settingsNode, L"renderQuality", quality);
        m_beastJob->setRenderQuality(quality);

        int maxRayDepth;
        getPlugValue(settingsNode, L"maxRayDepth", maxRayDepth);
        m_beastJob->setRenderMaxDepth(maxRayDepth);

        int causticsMode;
        getPlugValue(settingsNode, L"causticsMode", causticsMode);
        m_beastJob->setCausticsMode((ECausticsModeType)causticsMode);
}

bool RenderJob::runJob() {
        MObject settingsNode = findMayaNode(L"beastSettings");
        bool enableDistribution = true; 
        getPlugValue(settingsNode, L"distribution", enableDistribution);
        return runBeastAPIJob(getBeastJob(), ILB_SR_KEEP_OPEN, enableDistribution ? ILB_RD_AUTODETECT : ILB_RD_FORCE_LOCAL);
}

}
